notifications.title: Financial Data Contradiction
notifications.message: The 'Amount Covered by Insurance' is stated as ₹0.00, while the 'Patient's Balance' is ₹350,000.00 for a total bill of ₹400,000.00. This implies ₹50,000.00 was covered, directly contradicting the stated 'Amount Covered by Insurance'. This inconsistency needs immediate clarification.
notifications.action_required: Reconcile financial records with the insurance provider and the hospital's billing department to clarify the actual covered amount and patient responsibility.

notifications.title: Approved Pre-authorization Not Reflected in Coverage
notifications.message: Please contact the insurance desk regarding: Approved Pre-authorization Not Reflected in Coverage
notifications.action_required: Contact Red Insurance immediately to ascertain why the approved pre-authorization has not resulted in coverage for the bill. Verify if all procedures billed align with the pre-authorized services and if any deductibles, co-pays, or non-covered services are impacting the claim.
